PRIVATE_KEY.description: Enter your private key of liquidator wallet

CHAIN_ID.description: Id for Blockchain connection configs. Supported: 1(Ethereum), 56(BinanceSmartChain), 128(Heco), 137(Matic), 43114(Avalance). Default: BinanceSmartChain

SENTRY_DSN.description: DSN for error reporting. Disables Sentry if empty
